title: Zenki: The Phoenix's Blade
body:
**NOTE:** This Champion is an idea, so the numbers may be extremely under/over powered, it's more to showcase the idea that I have, if you think that you can tweak the numbers better than I can, which you probably will, please feel free to comment below to help improve this Champion's Balancing. Thanks.
---
Zenki is the Samurai of the Phoenix, but is more known as the Phoenix's Blade, he offers an extremely powerful kit which explodes late game, he starts the game off being able to buy a unique item called

** _Blade of the Phoenix_**
_5 Attack Damage
5 Ability Power
+ 5 Health on Hit
+ 3 Gold on Minion Kills_

Which can then be upgraded into 1 of 3 listed below, which are built for choice:

_**Heart of Willpower**
40% Attack Speed
20% Critical Chance
50% Bonus Critical Damage
Basic Attacks reduce Cooldowns by 0.25_

_**Hand of Strength**
75 Attack Damage
10% Lifesteal
Basic Attacks shred armor by 5%, stacking up to 5 times for a max of 25%_

_**Mind of Intellect**
40 Attack Damage
40 Ability Power
20% Attack Speed
Bonus 10% AD + 5% AP on hit_

**His Stats**
Attack Power: **0000000**000
Defense Power: **000**0000000
Ability Power: **000000**0000
Difficulty: **0000000**000
---
**Passive: Eternal Blaze**
Every third basic attack, Zenki's Blade is imbued with Eternal Blaze, giving an effect based on which  1 of 3 unique items you have from the shop:

_**Normal**: Bonus Damage = 5% AD + 5% AP
**Heart of Willpower**: Ignores 15% Armor
**Hand of Strength**: True Damage = 25% AD
**Mind of Intellect**: Bonus Damage = 10% AD + 10% AP _
---
**Q: Descendants of the Phoenix**
Zenki summons a phoenix in the form of a skillshot at target direction, applying on-hit effects, classifying as melee (titanic hydra works), and marking the target for the next 3 seconds, within these seconds, Zenki can fly to the target's location. If the skillshot kills the target, the cooldown is halved, bonus effects & damage are based on the unique items:

_**Normal**: 50/75/100/125/150 + 20% AD + 20% AP
**Heart of Willpower**: 50/75/100/125/150 + 35% AD + Can Crit
**Hand of Strength**: 50/75/100/125/150 + 50% AD + Targets explode upon death if they die from the skillshot or while the mark is active, dealing 25% AD around their corpse
**Mind of Intellect**: 50/75/100/125/150 + 30% AD + 30% AP_
---
**W: Absorbing the Flames**
Zenki heals for 10% of damage done within the last 3 Seconds + 25/50/75/100/125 flat instantly.
---
**E: Heat Wave**
Zenki slices wind infront of him, dealing damage and going through targets, dealing more damage as it hits targets, up to + 50%, damage affected by unique item type:

_**Normal**: 40/50/60/70/80 + 40% AD + 20% AP
**Heart of Willpower**: 40/50/60/70/80 + 75% AD + Can Crit
**Hand of Strength**: 40/50/60/70/80 + 125% AD 
**Mind of Intellect**: 40/50/60/70/80 + 50% AD + 30% AP_
---
**R: Rebirth of the Phoenix**
Zenki is imbued with Eternal Blaze for 3/4/5 Seconds, causing all his attacks (including skills) to apply Eternal Blaze as well as a bonus from buying one of three items from the shop. 

_**Heart of Willpower**: Critical Strikes heal for 10% of damage dealt
**Hand of Strength**: Basic attacks shred armor by 10% instead of 5%
**Mind of Intellect**: Every strike also deals damage in a cone behind the target_
